name: microcosmos
description:
Under the microscope, its eat or be eaten. You were the top of the food chain but now it's your turn. Survive the onslaught of a new invasive species and use your superior strength and speed to stay alive. 

Controls: 

  • WASD for movement
  • SPACE to unleash a defensive shockwave

All art, code, and music by Samuel Dost, unless otherwise attributed.

Background adapted from: b3ba722645ba31e3dd57ec829c4472fe95e3de28.png (609×547) (b-cdn.net)

FiraCode Font from: tonsky/FiraCode: Free monospaced font with programming ligatures (github.com)
